manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Newrichbee Newrichbee is dedicated to provide soft toothbrush for kids and adult .As an oral care company ,We create all kinds of lovely toothbrush for kids 1- 8 Years old. Soft bristle toothbrush for adult who is sensitive teeth or gum.

Extra soft toothbrush is suitable for sensitive gum or teeth .With 20000 bristle and small head design, it can clean throughly and gentlely.We design this toothbrush with 8 gap on the toothbrush bristle to give space for the bristle to move right and left. With the deep melt technology.Every bristle deep into the toothbrush head .Never happen the thing like others which is the bristle fall off. Every toothbrush come with toothbrush cover and individual package
Every toothbrush come with toothbrush cover and individual package

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: You never really know what you're going to get when trying a product for the first time. I know I needed a new toothbrush, so I decided to look for something soft to be nice to my gums.These are fantastic! The bristles polish your teeth and feel incredible on your gums. It's truly unlike any normal brush. I've used the traditional type, electric, and Sonicare. These are just a whole different experience. They're pretty inexpensive, so if you're contemplating, just get them.I love them so much I gave one to my bf and he also approves!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Where has this toothbrush been all my life? It’s soft, small, and works great with the purple whitening toothpaste I use. Reaches my back teeth easily, which is hard for a larger toothbrush to do because of my TMJ. Cleans and polishes my teeth so nicely. Can’t imagine going back to a harsh toothbrush, and even “soft” toothbrushes feel harsh compared to this one. And to get a four-pack? Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very gentle and cleans well
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised how well this cleans and how much more comfortable it is than any other toothbrush I’ve used.I was worried it would be so soft it would flatten but the bristles are pretty springy, just so closely packed and fine that it feels gentler. Pressing hard doesn’t made it dig into the crevices of my mouth or collapse. It’s not a soft toothbrush that flattens and it’s not a flosstip that painfully pokes into every space.I was also worried about it holding water. It doesn’t seem to stay that much wetter than other toothbrushes I’ve had as long as I flick the water out of the bristles.The head is very small which also makes it more comfortable to get into the far spaces of my mouth.I really recommend for sensitive mouths and sensory problems. It’s way easier to start brushing again with this than with any other brush, whether I stopped because I was gagging from the sensory overload or because it was painful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the soft bristles, hate the slippery handle
reviews.reviewText: I have mixed feelings about this toothbrush. I love the supremely soft bristles, and I feel like it gently but efficiently polishes the surface of my teeth. However, after a few weeks of use, the bristles seem to get even softer (if that's possible) and stop scrubbing as much in btwn the teeth/the crevices where the gums meet the inside of the teeth. It's still working sufficiently but def. don't skip flossing with this brush!The one thing I hate about this toothbrush is that the handle area, tho covered in a rubbery material, is too slick, and slips around when it gets wet (as a toothbrush handle is want to during the brushing of teeth). The toothpaste/saliva/water that drips down the toothbrush makes the area slick, and I find myself gripping extra hard and repositioning the brush to get the correct angles for the insides of the back molars. I hope they fix this design flaw.I have not observed any molding issue with my toothbrush, it seems to air out fully in btwn 2x daily brushings, and even on the occasions when I brush my teeth 3x in a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toothbrushes ever !
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely so happy to buy these toothbrushes. I just ordered my 2nd box. So soft & they reach all the areas my old brushes couldn't get. I was getting so annoyed buying all the other brands labeled extra soft & finding that after a few uses they seem to become course or the bristles start shedding. These are awesome & cost less than most of the other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Handle/grip is terrible, but brush head is terrific
reviews.reviewText: Love the brush head but the handle is awkward to hold and I often drop the brush.Begging the manufacturer to change the grip; I suggest using the Nimbus brand, sold on Amazon, as an example of a great grip to copy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value, soft bristles
reviews.reviewText: Soft and I love the brush shape! Not sure if it’s cleaning as well as a stronger bristle but it doesn’t hurt my sensitive teeth or gums so that’s something!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Squeaky clean teeth!
reviews.reviewText: After trying so many different whitening products that didn't work it occurred to me maybe it wasn't the toothpaste that was the problem but the toothbrush. With a little research I found a study about the cleaning ability of a 20,000 bristle toothbrush.The bristles are so soft that I can scrub hard around the gum line without any bleed. The bristles are so strong that they are not damaged by vigorous cleaning. The individual bristles are so fine that they fit in between teeth spaces were even floss can't go.I can hear the squeak of clean, feel the smoothness on the surface of my teeth, and see a visible difference as the yellow tarnish disappears to reveal a much whiter smile.
